text:
Hey Craig thank you for getting back. Ohh 3 weeks amazing. :) 

I see. My issue is how do I get rid of pinches, I heard you cant and have to subd them once or twice. Which I heard you cant remove just add extra sub. Yes that I got told which I never realised. My worries are in the shape of the window and when I use the cut tool and smooth I loose the outa edges. So its topology I gotta play with. 

Yeah. I did try to look at things interesting, its slightly hard when you dont want to spend a week. As I know that picking something crazy you can be stuff for months, so I dont want to spent so long and I do question what is it that companies want to see or dep for junior level.
I might consider doing that. I'm very used to just building assets. Never done a full scene small.
The phone was a test on modeling speed and texturing. Iv never textured so substance was my go to.

So I did worry I wonder what I could model and it has to be in real life and doing it over photos. I have questions on photo line up as well. If the image is distorted how do I go about that, because it's hard to line up a model if the image isnt accurate

Yeah  I was thinking to take a picture of an asset in a museum or a piece from a car part. Something small but impressive but that doesnt take long. So I can paint after and have amazing detail. Sorry for talking so much. But I had a lot in my head to ask and struggled how to ask.
Thanks for reading craig. Really helpful. :)
